abstract: Halloween festivities took a chunk out of network television audiences on Wednesday, but CBS retained the most viewers overall thanks to “Criminal Minds.” That show led the night, according to Nielsen’s estimates, with 14.7 million viewers at 9 p.m.
lead_paragraph: Halloween festivities took a chunk out of network television audiences on Wednesday, but CBS retained the most viewers overall thanks to “Criminal Minds.” That show led the night, according to Nielsen’s estimates, with 14.7 million viewers at 9 p.m.
